importMnemonic_passphraseHint: Optional BIP39 Passphrase. This is not your wallet password, and the Radix Desktop Wallet did not use a BIP39 passphrase. This is only to support import from other wallets that may have used one.
importMnemonic_backedUpAlert_message: Are you sure you have securely written down this seed phrase? You will need it to recover access if you lose your phone.
importMnemonic_backedUpAlert_confirmActi: Yes, I have backed it up
importMnemonic_failedToValidateAllAccoun: Failed to validate all accounts against mnemonic
importMnemonic_offDevice_storyPlaceholde: Hitchcock's The Birds mixed with Office space
importMnemonic_offDevice_storyHint: Without revealing the words, what comes to mind when reading this seed phrase?
importMnemonic_offDevice_locationPlaceho: In that book my mother used to read to me at my best childhoods summer vacation place
importMnemonic_offDevice_locationHint: Without revealing location, vague hint on where this mnemonic is backed up, if anywhere.
importMnemonic_shieldPrompt_backupSeedPh: Please write down seed phrase to ensure Account control
